Phyto-gro is fertilizer that is densely packed with all the nutrients plants need. It can be directly applied to plants or used in machines as a $(l:thermal:world/materials/catalysts)catalyst$(/l).

Phyto-gro is fertilizer that is densely packed with all the nutrients plants need. It can be directly applied to plants, spread in an area with $(l:thermal:equipment/explosives/phyto_explosives)some explosives$(/l), or used in machines as a $(l:thermal:world/materials/catalysts)catalyst$(/l).

$(o)Village elders speak of a lost formula of phyto-gro that could be infused with sap and redstone flux in order to improve crop yields far beyond what could be considered natural. Unfortunately, all attempts to recreate it have ended with failure.$()

Phyto-soil is dirt infused with phyto-gro. It approximately doubles the growth rate of plants grown on it, which can be further improved to ~5x using a $(l:thermal:technology/devices/soil_infuser)phyto-soil infuser$(/l). Just like normal soil, it must be tilled for crops to grow on it. Unlike normal farmland, tilled phyto-soil cannot be trampled and does not need water nearby to remain hydrated.
